lyrics.stanza: River of living water, River that flows from the throne, Fellowship giving and making God's own authority known.
River of living water, Fellowship freely bestows; Bringing authority with it, Through every place where it flows.
Water of life is the Spirit, God as the life in it flows; Carrying with it His Lordship, Through every place where it goes.
Midst the gold street it floweth, Thus showing to us the way; As in God's nature it floweth, So in His way we will stay.
The tree of life by the river, Shows to us God as our food; We by the river's full flowing Take of the tree's plenitude.
